tasks.task_description: Initialize CDK TypeScript project with proper context configuration
Create React TypeScript frontend structure in /src/webapp
Set up CDK infrastructure (S3, CloudFront, OAC)
Create dummy GeoJSON data for First Nations boundaries around Cairns
Create dummy health services data (Western and traditional)
Implement map interface with Leaflet centered on Cairns
Add geolocation and address search functionality
Implement First Nations boundary overlays on map
Create health services display page with click functionality
Add resource request form with mock submission
Ensure mobile responsiveness and optimize for mobile devices

description: Build responsive web-based mobile app for First Nations health services mapping in Cairns area
